授業目的: The purpose of the course is for students to become more affluent in discussing topics in groups through analysis of thematic issues, to improve their English presentation skills, and to become more effective conversational communicators.
到達目標:
Students will be able to:
- Understand and be able to give opinions about a variety of issues in English
- Share their ideas and contribute to group discussions
- Create and undertake a final presentation of a studied theme.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
